data.actual_result: Channel linking changes from `#test~1 ` to `#test` for example.
data.expected_result: Channel linking shouldn't change when editing a message to the first channel with this name.
data.short_description: Channel linking for a channel with same name like other one changes to first channel with this name after edit of the message
data.steps_to_repro: - Create two or more channels with the same name - Write a message with a channel linking to the second channel of the channels with the same name - Edit this message - Observe how the channel linking changes
